text: The World Phenomenology Institute (WPI) is an academic organization that recommends scholarship in the area of phenomenology. The organization was founded by Polish-American philosopher Anna-Teresa Tymieniecka (1923-2014) in 1976. It was first called the World Institute for Advanced Phenomenological Research and Learning. ==Related pages== * Anna-Teresa Tymieniecka * Phenomenology * Philosophy ==Other websites== * Category:Research organizations in the United States Category:Scientific organizations based in the United States Category:1976 establishments in the United States
title: World Phenomenology Institute
